text: Odax is a genus of marine ray-finned fish, weed whitings from the family Odacidae which are native to the Pacific waters of New Zealand. == Species == There are currently two recognized species in this genus: * Odax cyanoallix Ayling & Paxton, 1983 (Bluefinned butterfish) * Odax pullus (J. R. Forster, 1801) (Greenbone) == References == # Australian Museum: Herring cale, Odax cyanomelas. Retrieved 16 April 2015. # Froese, Rainer and Pauly, Daniel, eds. (2014). Species of Odax in FishBase. February 2014 version. Category:Labriformes
title: Odax
